comment.body: Certain medications such as diazepam make depression/dysphoria really bad. I took it in the past and it worked great for anxiety but eventually I realized the cure was worse than the ailment. If you're taking something similar, I would suggest asking your doc to switch up your medication. Message me for recommendations.
PHP is a server side language and ZeroNet has no "server side". Zites are made with HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
Nope, CoffeeScript is designed to compile to JavaScript. PHP is a completely different language.
@<tkarita/>: Nice, didn't know there was an update.
